item.title: Karnataka: 11-Year-Old Girl Dies From Electrocution At Government School In Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Karnataka: 11-Year-Old Girl Dies From Electrocution At Government School In Raichur | Representational Image
Raichur (Karnataka): An 11-year-old girl died after suffering an electric shock at a government school in this district on Friday, police said.
The girl, identified as Tanushree, was a class 5 student at the Government Lower Primary School in Kurukunda village of Sindhanur taluk.
According to police, the incident occurred during the midday meal break when the student went to drink wate...]]>
